titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish limitations on cost-sharing for out-of-network services in the individual market, to prohibit balance billing for such services, and for other purposes.
Reducing Costs for Out-of-Network Services Act of 2019
Reducing Costs for Out-of-Network Services Act of 2019
Reducing Costs for Out-of-Network Services Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
